dcterms:creator: W. Maddern
G. Pascoe
C. Linegar
P. Newman
dcterms:description: The RobotCar Seasons dataset contains 6,954 daytime images captured by a rear-facing camera mounted on a car driving in Oxford, with 3,978 query images taken over the course of a year, including some in challenging conditions such as nighttime.
dcterms:title: RobotCar Seasons

dcterms:creator: H. Badino
D. F. Huber
T. Kanade
dcterms:description: The Extended CMU-Seasons dataset consists of 7,159 reference images and 75,335 query images captured using two front-facing cameras mounted on a car in Pittsburgh, depicting different seasonal conditions.
dcterms:title: Extended CMU-Seasons
